Posts.Content: Hi Kathi. The news is devastating. You are a very strong person, looking at the positive that there is another angel out there with God. Thinking of you and keeping you in my prayers. Be strong. Love ireneincordova
Posts.Title: I'm back, with sad news

Posts.Content: Merry Christmas to you Susan. My first Christmas as well since the end of Chemo in August. We are truly blessed. I wish you a wonderful new year as well. Be well, God Bless Love Ireneincordova
Posts.Title: Merry Christmas to All
